title: Oklahoma City National Memorial: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News          The Oklahoma Update is the official newsletter of the national park units in the State of Oklahoma. Published twice yearly, the newsletter provides partners, stakeholders and park visitors with insight into park operations and events. The newsletter is available on the park website, via email, or through a traditional mailing list. Please contact us if you are interested in receiving future issues of the Update.
